bug.author: SteveXCIV
bug.summary: "Introduction to Tensors" has incorrect example image
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tensor>https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tensor</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tensor#multi-axis_indexing>https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/tensor#multi-axis_indexing</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
The left side image in the figure called "Selecting the last feature across all locations in each example in the batch" has batches 1 (blue) and 2 (green) swapped. The right side image and the surrounding code example show the correct order. The image that needs an edit is: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/guide/images/tensor/index1.png>https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/guide/images/tensor/index1.png</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Submit a pull request?</denchmark-h>
No. I do not have a way to edit the image.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting. Fixed. It will take a day for the change to propagate to the site.
